TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SynonymTokenFilter extends Azure.Search.Documents.Indexes.Models.TokenFilter

Docs.summary: Matches single or multi-word synonyms in a token stream. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> synonyms) cil managed
Public Sub New (name As String, synonyms As IEnumerable(Of String))

Docs.param: The name of the token filter. It must only contain letters, digits, spaces, dashes or underscores, can only start and end with alphanumeric characters, and is limited to 128 characters.

A list of synonyms in following one of two formats: 1. incredible, unbelievable, fabulous => amazing - all terms on the left side of => symbol will be replaced with all terms on its right side; 2. incredible, unbelievable, fabulous, amazing - comma separated list of equivalent words. Set the expand option to change how this list is interpreted.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of SynonymTokenFilter.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Expand As Nullable(Of Boolean)
member this.Expand : Nullable<bool> with get, set

Docs.summary: A value indicating whether all words in the list of synonyms (if => notation is not used) will map to one another. If true, all words in the list of synonyms (if => notation is not used) will map to one another. The following list: incredible, unbelievable, fabulous, amazing is equivalent to: incredible, unbelievable, fabulous, amazing => incredible, unbelievable, fabulous, amazing. If false, the following list: incredible, unbelievable, fabulous, amazing will be equivalent to: incredible, unbelievable, fabulous, amazing => incredible. Default is true.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property IgnoreCase As Nullable(Of Boolean)
member this.IgnoreCase : Nullable<bool> with get, set

Docs.summary: A value indicating whether to case-fold input for matching. Default is false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Synonyms As IList(Of String)

Docs.summary: A list of synonyms in following one of two formats: 1. incredible, unbelievable, fabulous => amazing - all terms on the left side of => symbol will be replaced with all terms on its right side; 2. incredible, unbelievable, fabulous, amazing - comma separated list of equivalent words. Set the expand option to change how this list is interpreted.
